response.overview: Massimina is a 56-year-old woman. Massimina is a sex worker. Massimina was born in Rome. Massimina doesn't believe in God... but she believes in Buddha. At night, she reflects on the ghosts of her past and attempts to push them away, with closed eyes in front of the altar. When her mind is crowded with thoughts, she walks by the sea. Massimina lost her brother. She lost many sisters in the streets. She has many clients... she goes to dinner with them, she calls them, has sex with them. Massimina has a great friend, her name is Denis. She also has a cat, Cirillo. Massimina fears no death... and she stares life straight in the eyes. Massimina is saintly and cursed. Massimina is sincere and a lier. Who is Massimina...?
response.title: Maximina
